trans-unit.source: A simple solution, using flexbox:
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的解决方案,使用flexbox。

trans-unit.source: All major browsers and IE11+ support Flexbox. For IE 10 or older, you can use the FlexieJS shim.
trans-unit.target: 所有主流浏览器和IE11+都支持Flexbox。对于IE 10或更早的浏览器,你可以使用FlexieJS shim。

trans-unit.source: Also, assuming your content could be larger than the viewport, you will need to set overflow-y to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 另外,假设你的内容可能比视口大,你需要设置溢出-y来滚动。

trans-unit.source: Also, look at the image below which I created for you:
trans-unit.target: 另外,看看下面的图片,我为你创造的图片。

trans-unit.source: An alternate solution, with a div centered within the content div
trans-unit.target: 另一种解决方案,以内容DIV为中心的DIV。

trans-unit.source: An another choice would be CSS Grid Layout but that has even less support from stable versions of browsers. In practice, only MSIE 10 supports this.
trans-unit.target: 另一个选择是CSS Grid Layout，但对稳定版本的浏览器的支持甚至更少。实际上，只有MSIE 10支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: Elements inside the content div will have heights set to percentages as well. So something at 100% inside the div will fill it to the bottom. As will two elements at 50%.
trans-unit.target: content div 中的元素的高度也将设置为百分比。因此， div 内100％的内容将填充到底部。两个元素占50％。

trans-unit.source: Expand snippet
trans-unit.target: 扩展片段

trans-unit.source: For anything inside the content div, setting top: 0; will put it right underneath the header. Sometimes the content will be a real table, with its height set to 100%. Putting header inside content will not allow this to work.
trans-unit.target: 对于内容div中的任何内容，请设置 top: 0; 将其放在标题下方。有时，内容将是一个实际表，其高度设置为100％。将 header 放在 content 中将使其无法使用。

trans-unit.source: For instance, if the header takes up 20% of the screen's height, a table specified at 50% inside #content would take up 40% of the screen space. So far, wrapping the entire thing in a table is the only thing that works.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果标题占据屏幕高度的20％，则在 #content 内指定为50％的表将占据屏幕空间的40％。到目前为止，将整个内容包装在表中是唯一有效的方法。

trans-unit.source: I am working on a web application where I want the content to fill the height of the entire screen.
trans-unit.target: 我正在开发一个Web应用程序,我想让内容填充整个屏幕的高度。

trans-unit.source: I checked it, It works in all major browsers: Chrome, IE, and FireFox
trans-unit.target: 我检查了它，它可以在所有主要浏览器中使用： Chrome ， IE 和 FireFox

trans-unit.source: I do use angular and I want my component sizes to be 100% of their parent element.
trans-unit.target: 我确实使用Angular,我希望我的组件尺寸是其父元素的100%。

trans-unit.source: I found a quite simple solution, because for me it was just a design issue. I wanted the rest of the Page not to be white below the red footer. So i set the pages background color to red. And the contents backgroundcolor to white. With the contents height set to eg. 20em or 50% an almost empty page won't leave the whole page red.
trans-unit.target: 我找到了一个很简单的解决方案,因为对我来说,这只是一个设计问题。我希望页面的其他部分不要在红色的页脚下是白色的。所以我把页面的背景颜色设置为红色。而内容的背景色为白色。当内容高度设置为20em或50%时,一个几乎是空的页面不会让整个页面变成红色。

trans-unit.source: I had the same problem but I could not make work the solution with flexboxes above. So I created my own template, that includes:
trans-unit.target: 我有同样的问题,但我无法用上面的flexboxes来解决。于是,我创建了自己的模板,包括。

trans-unit.source: I have a header div and a content div. At the moment I am using a table for the layout like so:
trans-unit.target: 我有一个标题 div 和一个内容 div 。目前，我正在使用表格进行布局，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: I posted my template here: https://jsfiddle.net/abreneliere/mrjh6y2e/3
trans-unit.target: 我在这里发布了模板：https：//jsfiddle.net/abreneliere/mrjh6y2e/3

trans-unit.source: I used flexboxes but in a more simple way, using only properties display: flex and flex-direction: row|column:
trans-unit.target: 我使用了flexbox，但是以一种更简单的方式，只使用了display属性：flex和flex-direction：row | column：

trans-unit.source: I wresteled with this for a while and ended up with the following:
trans-unit.target: 我为此纠结了好一阵子,最后得出了以下结论:

trans-unit.source: I've been searching for an answer for this as well. If you are fortunate enough to be able to target IE8 and up, you can use display:table and related values to get the rendering rules of tables with block-level elements including div.
trans-unit.target: 我也一直在寻找答案。如果您有幸能够定位IE8及更高版本，则可以使用 display:table 和相关值来获取具有div块级元素的表的渲染规则。

trans-unit.source: If you are even luckier and your users are using top-tier browsers (for example, if this is an intranet app on computers you control, like my latest project is), you can use the new Flexible Box Layout in CSS3!
trans-unit.target: 如果您更加幸运，并且您的用户使用的是顶级浏览器（例如，如果这是您控制的计算机上的Intranet应用程序，例如我的最新项目），则可以在CSS3中使用新的Flexible Box Layout！

trans-unit.source: If you can deal with not supporting old browsers (that is, MSIE 9 or older), you can do this with Flexible Box Layout Module which is already W3C CR. That module allows other nice tricks, too, such as re-ordering content.
trans-unit.target: 如果您可以处理不支持旧版本浏览器（即MSIE 9或更早版本）的情况，则可以使用已经是W3C CR的Flexible Box Layout Module来实现。该模块还允许其他不错的技巧，例如重新排序内容。

trans-unit.source: In all sane browsers, you can put the "header" div before the content, as a sibling, and the same CSS will work. However, IE7- does not interpret the height correctly if the float is 100% in that case, so the header needs to be IN the content, as above. The overflow: auto will cause double scroll bars on IE (which always has the viewport scrollbar visible, but disabled), but without it, the content will clip if it overflows.
trans-unit.target: 在所有正常的浏览器中,你可以把 "header "div放在内容之前,作为一个兄弟姐妹,同样的CSS也可以工作。但是,IE7-在这种情况下,如果float是100%,则无法正确解释高度,所以header需要放在内容中。溢出:auto会在IE上造成双滚动条(IE上总是有视口滚动条可见,但被禁用),但如果没有它,内容会在溢出时被夹住。

trans-unit.source: In the CSS above, the flex property shorthands the flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis properties to establish the flexibility of the flex items. Mozilla has a good introduction to the flexible boxes model.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的CSS中，flex属性是flex-grow，flex-shrink和flex-basis属性的简写形式，以建立flex项目的灵活性。Mozilla 很好地介绍了弹性盒模型。

trans-unit.source: In this way, I do not need to play around with display or positioning. This came in handy when using Bootstrap to make a dashboard wherein I had a sidebar and a main. I wanted the main to stretch and fill the entire vertical space so that I could apply a background colour.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,我就不需要在显示或定位上做文章了。这在使用Bootstrap制作一个仪表板时非常有用,我在这里有一个侧边栏和一个主栏。我希望主图能拉伸并填充整个垂直空间,这样我就可以应用背景颜色。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using tables in the markup, you could use CSS tables.
trans-unit.target: 在标记中不使用表格,可以使用CSS表来代替。

trans-unit.source: Is there a way to achieve the same effect without using the table?
trans-unit.target: 有没有一种方法可以在不使用 table 情况下达到相同的效果？

trans-unit.source: It could be done purely by CSS using vh:
trans-unit.target: 可以完全由 CSS 使用 vh 完成：

trans-unit.source: It's dynamic calc the remining screen space, better using Javascript.
trans-unit.target: 它是动态计算剩余屏幕空间,最好使用Javascript。

trans-unit.target: JSFiddle现场预览

trans-unit.source: Just defining the body with display:grid and the grid-template-rows using auto and the fr value property.
trans-unit.target: 只是定义 body 与 display:grid 和 grid-template-rows 用 auto 和 fr 值属性。

trans-unit.source: Just for completeness, here are the equivalent Html elements to css properties for the The CSS table model
trans-unit.target: 为了完整起见，这是CSS表格模型的 CSS属性的等效Html元素

trans-unit.source: Just make sure that you use height: 100%; for the parent elements.
trans-unit.target: 只要确保您使用 height: 100%; 用于父元素。

trans-unit.source: Look at the code snippet I created for you below and run it:
trans-unit.target: 在下面查看我为您创建的代码片段，然后运行它：

trans-unit.source: Make a div fill the height of the remaining screen space
trans-unit.target: 做一个DIV来填充剩余屏幕空间的高度

trans-unit.source: Markup
trans-unit.target: Markup

trans-unit.source: None of the solutions posted work when you need the bottom div to scroll when the content is too tall. Here's a solution that works in that case:
trans-unit.target: 当你需要底部div滚动时,当内容太高时,没有一个解决方案是有效的。这里有一个在这种情况下的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Note: Though CSS Flexible Boxes Layout specification is at the Candidate Recommendation stage, not all browsers have implemented it. WebKit implementation must be prefixed with -webkit-; Internet Explorer implements an old version of the spec, prefixed with -ms-; Opera 12.10 implements the latest version of the spec, unprefixed. See the compatibility table on each property for an up-to-date compatibility status.
trans-unit.target: 注意:虽然CSS弹性框布局规范还处于候选推荐阶段,但并不是所有的浏览器都实现了它。WebKit的实现必须以-webkit-为前缀;Internet Explorer实现了旧版本的规范,以-ms-为前缀;Opera 12.10实现了最新版本的规范,没有前缀。有关最新的兼容性状态,请参见每个属性的兼容性表。

trans-unit.source: Of course, the math can be simplified but you get the idea...
trans-unit.target: 当然,数学可以简化,但你明白了吧......

trans-unit.source: Once you can get this value and set the element's height, you need to attach event handlers to both the window onload and onresize so that you can fire your resize function.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你可以得到这个值并设置元素的高度,你需要将事件处理程序附加到window onload和onresize两个事件处理程序,这样你就可以启动调整大小函数。

trans-unit.source: Original source: Filling the Remaining Height of a Container While Handling Overflow in CSS
trans-unit.target: 原文来源:《在CSS中处理溢出时填充容器的剩余高度》。在CSS中处理溢出时填充容器的剩余高度

trans-unit.source: Simply use min-height(instead of height) with calc() to the content block.
trans-unit.target: 只需在内容块中使用min-height(而不是height),用calc()来表示。

trans-unit.source: Since it is easy to make the content DIV the same height as the parent but apparently difficult to make it the parent height minus the header height I decided to make content div full height but position it absolutely in the top left corner and then define a padding for the top which has the height of the header. This way the content displays neatly under the header and fills the whole remaining space:
trans-unit.target: 由于要使内容DIV的高度与父的高度相同很容易,但要使其与父的高度减去页眉的高度显然很难,所以我决定将内容DIV全高,但绝对定位在左上角,然后定义一个与页眉高度相同的padding。这样的话,内容就会整齐地显示在标题下面,并填充整个剩余的空间。

trans-unit.source: So here, what am doing is, adding up the height of elements and than deducting from 100% using calc() function.
trans-unit.target: 因此，这里要做的是将元素的高度加起来，然后使用 calc() 函数从 100% 中扣除。

trans-unit.source: Solution above uses viewport units and flexbox, and is therefore IE10+, providing you use the old syntax for IE10.
trans-unit.target: 上面的解决方案使用视口单元和flexbox，因此是IE10 +，前提是您使用IE10的旧语法。

trans-unit.source: Spinning off the idea of Mr. Alien...
trans-unit.target: 从 "异形先生 "的想法中剥离出来......

trans-unit.source: Supports IE9 and up: click to see the link
trans-unit.target: 支持IE9及更高版本：单击以查看链接

trans-unit.source: The calc() starts with 100% and subtracts heights of headers and footers (need to include padding values)
trans-unit.target: calc()从100%开始,减去页眉和页脚的高度(需要包含padding值)。

trans-unit.source: The entire height of the page is filled, and no scrolling is required.
trans-unit.target: 整个页面的高度都会被填满,不需要滚动。

trans-unit.source: The key is to set the size (in percents) for all parents inorder to limit their size. In the following example myapp height has 100% of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 关键是为所有的父母设置大小(以百分数为单位),以限制他们的大小。在下面的例子中,我的app高度是100%的视口。

trans-unit.source: The main component has 90% of the viewport, because header and footer have 5%.
trans-unit.target: 主组件有90%的视口,因为页眉和页脚有5%。

trans-unit.source: The original post is more than 3 years ago. I guess many people who come to this post like me are looking for an app-like layout solution, say a somehow fixed header, footer, and full height content taking up the rest screen. If so, this post may help, it works on IE7+, etc.
trans-unit.target: 原帖是3年多前的帖子了。我想很多和我一样来这个帖子的人,都是想找一个类似于APP的排版方案,比如说一个莫名其妙的固定页眉、页脚、全高的内容占据了剩下的屏幕。如果是这样,这个帖子可能会有帮助,在IE7+等浏览器上也能用。

trans-unit.source: The page has a header, which contains a logo, and account information. This could be an arbitrary height. I want the content div to fill the rest of the page to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 页面有一个页眉,里面有一个Logo和账户信息。这可以是一个任意的高度。我希望content div能填满页面的其余部分到底部。

trans-unit.source: There are two other answers briefly mentioning flexbox; however, that was more than two years ago, and they don't provide any examples. The specification for flexbox has definitely settled now.
trans-unit.target: 还有两个简短提及flexbox的答案；但是，那是两年多以前的事了，他们没有提供任何示例。flexbox的规范现在肯定已经确定。

trans-unit.source: There really isn't a sound, cross-browser way to do this in CSS. Assuming your layout has complexities, you need to use JavaScript to set the element's height. The essence of what you need to do is:
trans-unit.target: 在CSS中真的没有一个完善的、跨浏览器的方法来做这个事情。假设你的布局很复杂,你需要使用JavaScript来设置元素的高度。你需要做的事情的本质是。

trans-unit.source: There's a ton of answers now, but I found using height: 100vh; to work on the div element that needs to fill up the entire vertical space available.
trans-unit.target: 现在有很多答案，但是我发现使用 height: 100vh; 在需要填充整个可用垂直空间的div元素上工作。

trans-unit.source: This seems a cleaner solution than the popular flex box one for CSS3 enabled browsers.
trans-unit.target: 这似乎是一个比支持CSS3的浏览器的Flex box更干净的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: To check current support you can also see here: http://caniuse.com/#feat=flexbox
trans-unit.target: 要查看当前支持，您还可以在此处查看：http : //caniuse.com/#feat=flexbox

trans-unit.source: Try this
trans-unit.target: 试试这个

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, MSIE 9 or lesser do not support this and you have to use vendor prefix for the CSS property for every browser other than Firefox. Hopefully other vendors drop the prefix soon, too.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是,MSIE 9或更低版本不支持这个,除了Firefox之外,你必须使用供应商的CSS属性前缀。希望其他厂商也能很快放弃这个前缀。

trans-unit.source: Used: height: calc(100vh - 110px);
trans-unit.target: 使用的： height: calc(100vh - 110px);

trans-unit.source: Using "min-height" instead of "height" is particularly useful so it can work with javascript rendered content and JS frameworks like Angular2. Otherwise, the calculation will not push the footer to the bottom of the page once the javascript rendered content is visible.
trans-unit.target: 使用 "min-height "而不是 "height "是特别有用的,这样它可以与javascript渲染的内容和像Angular2这样的JS框架一起工作。否则,一旦javascript渲染的内容可见后,计算将不会把页脚推到页面底部。

trans-unit.source: Vincent, I'll answer again using your new requirements. Since you don't care about the content being hidden if it's too long, you don't need to float the header. Just put overflow hidden on the html and body tags, and set #content height to 100%. The content will always be longer than the viewport by the height of the header, but it'll be hidden and won't cause scrollbars.
trans-unit.target: Vincent，我将根据您的新要求再次回答。由于您不关心内容是否太长而被隐藏，因此不需要浮动标题。只需将溢出隐藏在html和body标签上，然后将 #content 高度设置为100％。内容将始终比视口长标题的高度，但是它将被隐藏并且不会引起滚动条。

trans-unit.source: What worked for me (with a div within another div and I assume in all other circumstances) is to set the bottom padding to 100%. That is, add this to your css / stylesheet:
trans-unit.target: 对我来说,我的做法是将底部的padding设置为100%。也就是说,在你的css样式表中添加这样的内容。

trans-unit.source: When you want the middle element to span across entire page vertically, you can use calc() which is introduced in CSS3.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望中间元素垂直跨越整个页面，则可以使用CSS3中引入的 calc() 。

trans-unit.source: Why not just like this?
trans-unit.target: 为什么不是这样的?

trans-unit.source: With flexbox you can easily switch between any of your rows or columns either having fixed dimensions, content-sized dimensions or remaining-space dimensions. In my example I have set the header to snap to its content (as per the OPs question), I've added a footer to show how to add a fixed-height region and then set the content area to fill up the remaining space.
trans-unit.target: 使用flexbox,您可以轻松地在任何行或列之间切换,无论是固定尺寸、内容大小尺寸还是剩余空间尺寸。在我的例子中,我将标题设置为固定的内容(根据OPs的问题),我添加了一个页脚,显示如何添加一个固定高度的区域,然后设置内容区域来填充剩余空间。

trans-unit.source: Working example
trans-unit.target: 工作实例

trans-unit.source: Works for me
trans-unit.target: 对我来说很管用

trans-unit.source: You can actually use display: table to split the area into two elements (header and content), where the header can vary in height and the content fills the remaining space. This works with the whole page, as well as when the area is simply the content of another element positioned with position set to relative, absolute or fixed. It will work as long as the parent element has a non-zero height.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，您可以使用 display: table 将区域分为两个元素（标题和内容），其中标题的高度可以变化，内容填充剩余的空间。这适用于整个页面，以及当区域只是 position 设置为 relative ， absolute 或 fixed 的另一个元素的内容时。只要父元素的高度不为零，它将起作用。

trans-unit.source: You can use CSS-IN-JS technology, like below lib:
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用CSS-IN-JS技术,比如下面的lib。

trans-unit.target: 带滚动条的侧边栏,占据了剩余的高度。

trans-unit.target: 现在所有的主流浏览器都支持,所以如果你不需要支持复古浏览器,请继续使用。
